posts.title: Welcome to my blog
posts.text: 我知道现在可能说这话有点不合时宜，毕竟博客时代都已经过去了，再号召大家用过就好像时的东西是不是有点逆流而上？ Quick StartCreate a new post$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
